text: Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees.
You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand.
Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder.
You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?

"

I was in my room, alone and at first I thought a human intruder has come inside the house.
But their voice is too high pitched to be human.
It was then I realized, the intruder is a tiny bee.
I screamed on the top of my lungs.
"Get away from me, get away from me!
I am deathly allergic to bees!
" I screamed.
"But that's the thing, Your Majesty.
You are not allergic to us.
You're one of us.
" said the tiny bee.
"That's.
that's impossible!
I'm human, my mother was human so is my sister and my father.
" I argued as I looked for anything in the room to squat the tiny little thing.
"You have to be quiet.
Your mother and father may come and find us.
" said the bee.
"That's great for me, they'll kill you!
" I screamed as I quickly got a mathematics book to try and squat the bee.
The bee immediately flew over it and landed on my shoulder.
I screamed again.
"Shhhh!
" said the tiny bee as it buzzed on my ear.
It then stung me right on my shoulder and I screamed the loudest this time.
Finally, my mom and dad came knocking on my door.
"Honey, are you okay in there?
" said my mom as she tried to open the door.
I heard kicking of the door as I couldn't seem to move at this point.
Another kicks later and my dad have finally opened the door.
"Honey?
We heard screaming.
Where are you?
" said my father.
"I'm right here, there is a bee in here!
" I screamed.
They were not able to hear me.
My parents are also not able to see me, until my dad said, "Hon, there are two bees in here.

"

"Shoo, shoo!
" said my mother.
"They've got her, love.
They've got her.
How did they get in?

"

"We're going to have to call a specialist.
" said my dad.
